languages.text: "Быть может, за всем стоит род Гапрак? После проведенных в отношении вас карательных мер, причин вредить мне у вас предостаточно".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может, за всем стоит род Гапрак? После проведенных в отношении вас карательных мер, причин вредить мне у вас предостаточно".

languages.text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, за всем стоит род Гапрак? После проведенных в отношении вас карательных мер, причин вредить мне у вас предостаточно".

traits.locale_text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."
"Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."
"Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."
"Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."
"Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."

languages.text: “是贾帕克家族犯下了这样的罪行吗？我对你的家族进行了惩处，你确实有充分理由来颠覆我的统治。”
languages.original_text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."

traits.locale_text: “是贾帕克家族犯下了这样的罪行吗？我对你的家族进行了惩处，你确实有充分理由来颠覆我的统治。”

languages.text: "Könnte Haus Gaprak für die Verbrechen verantwortlich sein? Nach den Strafmaßnahmen gegen Euch habt Ihr reichlich Grund, meine Herrschaft zu untergraben."
languages.original_text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."

traits.locale_text: "Könnte Haus Gaprak für die Verbrechen verantwortlich sein? Nach den Strafmaßnahmen gegen Euch habt Ihr reichlich Grund, meine Herrschaft zu untergraben."

languages.text: « La maison Gaprak pourrait-elle être responsable de ces crimes ? Étant donné les mesures punitives prises à votre encontre, vous ne pouvez pas nier que vous avez d'excellentes raisons de vouloir saboter mon règne. »
languages.original_text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Gaprak pourrait-elle être responsable de ces crimes ? Étant donné les mesures punitives prises à votre encontre, vous ne pouvez pas nier que vous avez d'excellentes raisons de vouloir saboter mon règne. »

languages.text: «¿Podría la casa Gaprak ser responsable de estos crímenes? Con las medidas punitivas que tomé contra ustedes, tienen motivos de sobra para querer socavar mi reino».
languages.original_text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."

traits.locale_text: «¿Podría la casa Gaprak ser responsable de estos crímenes? Con las medidas punitivas que tomé contra ustedes, tienen motivos de sobra para querer socavar mi reino».

languages.text: 「ギャプラック家がそれら犯罪に関わってるのか？あなたに対して懲罰的措置がされた今、あなたが私の治世を貶める理由は、いくらでもある」
languages.original_text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."

traits.locale_text: 「ギャプラック家がそれら犯罪に関わってるのか？あなたに対して懲罰的措置がされた今、あなたが私の治世を貶める理由は、いくらでもある」

languages.text: "Suçların faili, Gaprak Hanesi olabilir mi? Size verilen cezalardan sonra hükümdarlığımı yıkmak için elinizde bolca sebep olsa gerek."
languages.original_text: "Could House Gaprak be responsible for the crimes? After the punitive measures taken against you, you have plenty of reasons to undermine my reign."

traits.locale_text: "Suçların faili Gaprak Hanesi olabilir mi? Size verilen cezalardan sonra hükümdarlığımı yıkmak için elinizde bolca sebep olsa gerek."
